scripts.dev:mobile: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process -WindowStyle Hidden cmd '/c npm run dev:lan'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; npx localtunnel@2.0.2 --port 3000"
scripts.dev:mobile:cfd: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process -WindowStyle Hidden cmd '/c npm run dev:lan'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:3000"
scripts.tunnel:cfd:path: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$exe=$env:CLOUDFLARED_EXE; if(-not (Test-Path $exe)){ Write-Error 'Set CLOUDFLARED_EXE to the full path of cloudflared.exe'; exit 1 }; & $exe tunnel --url http://localhost:3000"
scripts.dev:mobile:cfd:path: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process -WindowStyle Hidden cmd '/c npm run dev:lan'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; $exe=$env:CLOUDFLARED_EXE; if(-not (Test-Path $exe)){ Write-Error 'Set CLOUDFLARED_EXE to the full path of cloudflared.exe'; exit 1 }; & $exe tunnel --url http://localhost:3000"
